projects: [{"title":"Filtering by Aliasing Chip Design and Layout","start_date":"Jun 2017","end_date":"Present","description":"Designing a low-power filter circuit using aliasing which can efficiently work and filter out the noises and give us the required output."},{"title":"Gesture Controlled Obstacle Removal Bot","start_date":"Dec 2016","description":"Made a obstacle removal bot using Sonars and efficiently applied gesture control on its movement using accelerometer to get a Automatic Obstacle Removal Bot whose Movement can be controlled by the user"},{"title":"Traffic Security Camera System","start_date":"Mar 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"Designed a prototype for a smart Traffic Security Camera System. It captures moving vehicles at higher speed than the speed limit and also detects the face of the driver and number plate with efficiency of 88%"},{"title":"Self Sorting Waste Bin","start_date":"Mar 2017","end_date":"Apr 2017","description":"A smart waste sorting bin which can sort wastes categorized as Metals, Non Metals and Organic Wastes.Used Inductive Sensors and Capacitance Sensors for detecting the waste type and used Image Processing to sort the waste in proper bin/section."}]
